overview: Sensuous Nikki loves to spend her nights in the company of her best friends. One thing quickly leads to another when lovely neighbor Tracy Adams happens by during a romantic interlude between Nikki and steady boyfriend Billy Dee. Meanwhile, Buddy Love is caught with his pants down when he invites the nasty Nina to audition as a stripper while his wife Alexia is out for the evening. Alexia returns to join in the fun, but the tables soon turn when Nikki finds out.
title: All Knight Long
